jobs.title: Software Engineering Intern (Platforms Team, iOS)
descriptions: Built host mode on the Twitch iOS apps, which lets you watch streams hosted by people you follow and host streams yourself.
Built resume watching on the Twitch iOS apps, which lets you continue watching the VOD of a stream from where you left off.
Added VOD timestamping to universal app linking and deep linking.

jobs.title: Software Engineering Intern (Clients Team, iOS Core Services)
descriptions: Worked on core services for Twitter's iOS client.
Revamped push and SMS notification settings on the iOS client.

jobs.title: Software Engineering Intern (Microsoft Excel for iOS/OS X, Applications and Services Group)
descriptions: Built the cell comments feature in the iPhone version of Excel.
Built the UI for Microsoft Query on Excel for Mac 2016, which included SQL syntax highlighting and query results that load on scroll.

jobs.title: Web and GUI Developer Intern
descriptions: Built a GUI using C++ and Qt providing real-time trading engine data to the trading desk.
Built a real-time web dashboard for monitoring scripts running on various servers.
Worked on a Django web application for browsing trade summary data and TCAs.

jobs.title: Agile Engineering Intern (iOS Development)
descriptions: Built AccuWeather, a weather app providing detailed forecasts and a new UI for iOS 7.

jobs.title: Agile Engineering Intern (iOS Development)
descriptions: Worked on Cypress, a file management application on the iPhone and iPad that synchronizes local storage with Sharepoint, Dropbox, and Box.
Worked on Karmaloop, a shopping application on the iPhone.

skill_items.name: Objective-C
skill_items.description: Twitch, Twitter, Microsoft Excel, and AccuWeather.

skill_items.name: C++
skill_items.description: Microsoft Excel and Qt GUIs and networking code for Quantitative Brokers.

skill_items.name: Python
skill_items.description: Web back-ends at Quantitative Brokers and the script for generating this resume.

skill_items.name: JavaScript
skill_items.description: Front-ends (vanilla JS and Backbone.js) at Quantitative Brokers.

education.name: University of Waterloo
education.degree: Honours Bachelor of Computer Science, Minor in Economics
